message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $14000. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me. What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to sell it to you for $12500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13500. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $13000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me. What do you think?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $13250. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm afraid I need to be a bit more aggressive in my negotiation. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $13250 and $13000, which is $13125. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway between $13250 and $13125, which is $13187.50. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm afraid I need to be a bit more aggressive in my negotiation. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $13250 and $13125, which is $13187.50 is already your offer, so I'll go below that. I'll offer $13000 again, and this time it's my final offer.

I'm surprised you're willing to go back to $13000, Bob! I'm not willing to go that low. I'm going to have to pass on this offer and explore other opportunities. I think I'll sell the product to John for $12000 instead.
